widget.name: Feedback
widget.description: Allow users to submit feedback directly into the app project.

property.caption: App ID
property.description: The App ID is a hash that uniquely identifies your app project. You can find this ID in Settings > General in the Developer Portal.

property.caption: Allow screenshots
property.description: If you are not allowed to send screenshots when submitting feedback for legal reasons, set this to ‘No’.

property.caption: Logo
property.description: For customized branding, add a logo to the widget. The recommended size of the image is 90 by 90 pixels.
